content.question: A. Explain how architecture contributes to the cultural landscape shown in Image 2. B. Describe TWO ways in which new forms of cultural ideas and practices are socially constructed. C. Explain a limitation of using the images to understand how imperialism spread cultural patterns and processes from the location in Image 2 to the location in Image 1. D. Explain how shared public spaces contribute to a sense of place among residents of urban areas. E. Explain the degree to which a country’s government expresses political power by altering cultural landscapes.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
